articles.description: Harry Brook could have a similar impact for England as Kevin Pietersen, says former captain Michael Vaughan.
articles.title: Brook could have same impact as Pietersen - Vaughan

articles.description: Jordan Henderson has joined Saudi Arabian side Al-Ettifaq, but in doing so much of the LGBTQ+ community has been left disappointed in him.
articles.title: Henderson's Saudi move has 'tarnished reputation'

articles.description: England face a battle to level the Ashes after Australia enjoy the better of the first day of the fifth Test at The Oval.
articles.title: Australia make strong start to fifth Test

articles.description: Follow automated live text updates from Friday's Women's World Cup game between Argentina and South Africa.
articles.title: Argentina face South Africa at Women's World Cup - live

articles.description: Brighton reject an £80m bid for midfielder Moises Caicedo from Premier League rivals Chelsea.
articles.title: Brighton reject Chelsea's £80m Caicedo bid

articles.description: England midfielder Keira Walsh says she feels more responsibility on the pitch under manager Sarina Wiegman.
articles.title: Wiegman wants me to take responsibility - Walsh

articles.description: Australia will wait until the last minute to make a decision on captain Sam Kerr's fitness for their must-win Women's World Cup game against Canada.
articles.title: Australia to make late call on Kerr's fitness

articles.description: Hibernian suffer a calamitous defeat at the hands of Andorran side Inter Club d'Escaldes in the first leg of their Europa Conference League second qualifying round tie.
articles.title: Hapless Hibs suffer European shock in Andorra

articles.description: Watch highlights as Nigeria come from a goal down to beat Australia 3-2 in Brisbane and leave the co-hosts facing a battle to qualify for the last 16 of the Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Nigeria stun co-hosts Australia with comeback win

articles.description: Chris McQueen scores a crucial try as Huddersfield keep their faint Super League play-off hopes alive with victory over Hull FC.
articles.title: Giants defeat Hull FC to keep play-off hopes alive
